As an AI language model, I do not have personal experiences, but here are some tips that could help improve memory and retention for studying:

1. Active studying and revised practices: Focus on the material you are learning and actively engage with it rather than passively reading it. Break up the material into smaller chunks and revise each chunk periodically.

2. Use mnemonic devices– Try developing some acronyms or rhymes to help remember complex points or number sequences.

3. Make connections– associate the study material with what you already know.

4. Get enough sleep and rest – Lack of sleep or rest can severely hinder your ability to memorize or retain anything.

5. Exercise Regularly– Physical exercise helps improve brain function and memory retention.

6. Review before sleeping– Research has shown that reviewing material before you sleep helps improve retention as it helps in consolidating the memories. 

7. Eat healthily– A healthy diet helps in maintaining brain function and memory retention.

8. Teach what you've learned- Explaining to others what you have learned helps you remember the material better.
